name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? Quiz  | 15 Questions

questions.text: How do you spell the word 'QUESTION'?
Which of these films featured a lovable visitor from space?
In which of the following cities can you board a train at Waverley Station?
Which letter of the alphabet do geese usually form when flying in a group?
Who is the shaggy man-beast that supposedly lives in the Himalayas?
In which sport is 'Greco-Roman' a style?
In the movie 'Jerry Maguire', what was the profession of Tom Cruise's character?
Saint Bernard dogs were originally bred to help travelers in which mountain range?
What did my true love send to me on the tenth day of Christmas?
In British greyhound racing, what colour is worn by the dog in trap three?
Approximately how long is the Panama Canal, linking The Pacific and Atlantic Oceans?
Which country's international car registration is DZ?
Which team won the first Scottish FA Cup final?
If an object is described as 'hastate', what does it resemble in shape?
